import { useState } from "react" export default function Chat({ }) { const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const [user, setUser] = useState('') function messageHandle(ev) { setMessage(ev.target.value) } function changeUser(ev) { console.log(ev.target.option, ev) setUser(ev.target.value) } function sendMessage(ev) { ev.preventDefault() console.log(user, message) console.log(message) } return (
) }
